name: Prodigal
headline: Lending Intelligence Software
description:
Prodigal is a pioneer of Consumer Finance Intelligence, a new category of AI software that derives actionable insights from customer and patient interactions. Lenders and healthcare providers rely on Prodigal to boost profits, customer experience, and compliance by optimizing operations and quality assurance in their loan servicing and collection contact centers. 

Prodigal’s global team, whose backgrounds intersect at financial services and data science, is headquartered in Mountain View, California. Backed by technical and industry experts, Prodigal’s mission is to build the intelligence layer that powers Consumer Finance, becoming the next iconic vertical SaaS company. Nearly one in five U.S. borrowers have already engaged with Prodigal over more than 200 million interactions.

### Channel optimization
Target the right channel, timing, content, and frequency for each customer to boost payments.
[Increase omnichannel payments](https://prodigaltech.com/</personalize>)
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcb3bbf6fdac54bdd345a59/66d1d0229cd3a09bec7a1220_home-offerings-1.png)

Get dynamic propensity to pay scores so you can improve segmentation and increase payments.
[Liquidate portfolio faster](https://prodigaltech.com/</prioritize>)
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcb3bbf6fdac54bdd345a59/66d1d022c097e3d8ee1f681d_home-offerings-2.png)

Use data-backed, tailored offers for each borrower to maximize collections and repayment commitment.
[Increase collections per account](https://prodigaltech.com/</offers>)
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fcb3bbf6fdac54bdd345a59/66d1d022f3c61b3747d1c94d_home-offerings-4.png)

Real-time agent assist and speech analytics platform purpose-built for sourcing insights to increase revenue.
[Boost agent performance](https://prodigaltech.com/</operational-intelligence>)

**Prodigal**: Transforming Consumer Finance with AI

Founded in 2018 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S18, Prodigal is carving out a niche as a leader in Consumer Finance Intelligence through its innovative AI software. Headquartered in Mountain View, California, and bolstered by a team of 65 experts at the intersection of financial services and data science, Prodigal aims to create the intelligence layer that fuels the consumer finance industry.

### Mission and Offerings

At its core, Prodigal focuses on enhancing lender and healthcare provider operations by offering actionable insights derived from customer interactions. This is achieved through various solutions designed to optimize the loan servicing and collections processes. Key offerings include:

- **Strategic Intelligence**: 
  - **Channel Optimization**: Tailoring strategies to improve omnichannel payments.
  - **Intent-to-Pay**: Using dynamic scores to boost collections speed.
  - **Personalized Payment Plans**: Crafting bespoke repayment plans that encourage commitment.

- **Operational Intelligence**: 
  - **ProInsight**: Automation of quality assurance processes and revenue insights.
  - **ProNotes**: Real-time, standardized note-taking to enhance communication.
  - **ProAssist**: Providing agents with dynamic prompts for timely support.

### Industry Impact

With over 200 million interactions with nearly one in five U.S. borrowers, Prodigal's technology has proven to increase engagement and payment collection effectively. Their AI systems have resulted in up to a 27% boost in digital engagement and a remarkable 16% increase in payments. This is largely attributed to Prodigal's tailormade strategies that resonate with each individual borrower's needs.

### Customer Satisfaction and Security

Prodigal is making waves in the fintech sector, evidenced by its glowing testimonials from clients who report significant operational improvements and enhanced compliance. Their commitment to maintaining user trust is highlighted through rigorous data protection measures, ensuring confidentiality and integrity.

Rated 4.9 out of 5 on G2, Prodigal is recognized not just for its functionality but also for its easy onboarding process, inviting organizations to transform their collection strategies seamlessly.

### Why Choose Prodigal?

In a landscape where efficient communication directly translates to profit, Prodigal stands out. They're not just providing software; they’re offering a partnership focused on generating more payments and refining client relationships. With a tailored approach driven by advanced AI, Prodigal is on track to become an iconic name in the vertical SaaS space.

You can explore more about their offerings and solutions at [Prodigal's website](https://prodigaltech.com/).
